p: Two Gram-positive bacteria species (Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923 and Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212), two Gram-negative bacteria (Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 and Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853), and two yeasts (Saccharomyces cerevisiae ATCC 2601 and Candida albicans ATCC 10231) were used in this study. All bacteria were cultured at 37°C in Mueller-Hinton (Biokar Diagnostics, Beauvais, France) and the yeasts in Sabouraud dextrose agar (Difco).
